name: Perfect Speed
description:
Was 2020 a tough year till now? Let's release a rage virus and make it worse.

This is a Fast (Really ?) Action-Packed Shooter game that will make you dive back to the 90s and 00s games. Based on a small core logic, this game is made in 48 hours.

There is a virus outbreak that is OUT OF CONTROL. Wait a sec, there's more to it. Just PLAY THE GAME and DO SHARE YOUR SCORES TO EVERYONE.

CONTROLS-

WASD - movement keys

Right Click - shoots bullets

Left Click - shoots grenades

That's it. Use your ammunition very carefully. You die mostly because of your *noob skills* (just kidding) or "NO AMMO" banner in front of your eyes.

PS - I know there is no Web version for this game. I don't know why, but god wasn't in my favour when I built for WebGL. I tried for 6 hrs to fix the bugs and make it build but sadly, it was not enough. So, DOWNLOAD THE GAME AND PLAY IT. Don't ignore this page because of the invisible Web version.

If you're still reading this, Thank you for your patience. 

DO RATE MY GAME HERE - https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2020/rate/697927
